features.additionalValue: No Early Repayment Adjustment or Administrative fees
features.additionalInfo: There is no Early Repayment Adjustment (ERA) or Administrative Fee applied if you break the fixed interest rate period by paying your loan partially or in full.
10 years. You have the certainty of knowing exactly what your repayments will be – giving you the confidence to budget accurately and plan ahead.

For eligible owner-occupied home loans, you’ll receive the benefit of Home Loan Compassionate Care, which is complimentary protection that helps support you by paying your home loan repayments for around 12 months if you, your spouse of dependant passes away or is medically certified with a terminal illness.
Wherever you are in the world, CommBank gives you the choice and control to securely manage all of your accounts on a range of devices, the way you want.

Installation of eligible small-scale renewables must be completed by an approved retailer and/or installer and trained to ensure systems meet industry best practice standards and all relevant Australian Standards (as accredited by the Clean Energy Council).

A CommBank Green Loan is not available if your existing loan is or has any of the following features: Construction loans (which are not yet fully funded), Bridging loans, Equity Unlock for Seniors (EQFS), Loans with a Property Share arrangement, Loans with multiple securities, Non-personal borrower(s) such as a Company and/or Trust, or Loans guaranteed by a guarantor or government through the First Home Loan Deposit Scheme (FHLDS).

constraints.additionalInfo: For a Green Loan, there is a minimum loan amount of $5,000.
For a Green Loan, there is a maximum loan amount of $20,000.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Individuals (natural persons) must have the legal capacity to enter into the loan contract, provide acceptable identification documentation and be 18 years or older.
Applications for home loans are subject to the Bank's normal credit approval.

eligibility.additionalValue: Existing eligible CommBank Home loan or CommBank Investment Home Loan
eligibility.additionalInfo: Eligible borrower(s) must have an existing eligible CommBank Home Loan or CommBank Investment Home Loan open with a minimum outstanding balance of $150,000 (not including your available redraw balance) and where the existing loan is secured against 1 property only (and is not an apartment or commercial property). The address for installation matches the address we have listed as security for your existing home loans and your total lending balance (existing Home/Investment Home Loan and new CommBank Green Loan/CommBank Investment Green Loan) must not exceed 80% of the security property's value (subject to any postcode restrictions).

eligibility.additionalValue: Install eligible small-scale renewables on the property
eligibility.additionalInfo: The CommBank Green Loan must be used to install eligible small-scale renewables on the property used to secure the existing home loan such as solar panels, solar hot water systems or battery packs.

Installation of eligible small-scale renewables must be completed by an approved retailer and/or installer and trained to ensure systems meet industry best practice standards and all relevant Australian Standards (as accredited by the Clean Energy Council).
The borrower(s) names on the CommBank Green Loan must match the borrower(s) name on the existing CommBank home loan.
Your CommBank Green Loan has only one security, being the address for installation (of eligible clean energy products).

fees.name: Late Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For home loans - If your account falls into arrears, you will be charged a late payment fee. The fee is payable on the fifth business day after the monthly repayment due date. We will continue to charge the fee monthly until you repay all arrears or you enter into an arrangement with us for the full repayment of those arrears (even if you repay your loan weekly or fortnightly). If you break that arrangement the fee will continue to apply.

data.name: CommBank Green Loan
data.description: Customers with an eligible CommBank home loan or investment home loan can use the Green Loan to buy and install eligible clean energy products such as solar panels, battery packs or solar hot water systems at the property used to secure their existing home loan.
